name: Rolling Stones
description:
You are the Rock God, but you have been reduced and imprisoned by the metal gods to a small island. On this island live four races who are set on your destruction. You must use your rock power to defend your temple from their forces.

Space - Summon Rock

WASD - Direct Rock*

Mouse LMB, Wheel and RMB allow you to pan, zoom and rotate the view.

*If WASD does not work try going full screen by clicking on the blue full screen button in the bottom right corner.
